description:
Classic lines and classic comfort. Made from a soft wool blend, the Lada will keep you warm even if you get caught in the rain.

  • Single chest pocket with a corozo button closure
  • Soft fine wool blend is warm and comfy, not warm and itchy
  • Regular fit, so you get no surprises, just comfort
name: Fjallraven Lada Round-Neck Sweater - Men's
